version_description:
• Chase QuickPay payments are now available within minutes between Chase and select banks.
• Search, sort and filter credit card transactions.
• Now pay or transfer funds without having to re-enter your password when you log on with Touch ID.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

• Chase QuickPay payments are now available within minutes between Chase and select banks.
• Search, sort and filter credit card transactions.
• Now pay or transfer funds without having to re-enter your password when you log on with Touch ID.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes and improvements.
• Redesigned look and user experience for J.P. Morgan QuickDepositSM
•Minor bug fixes and improvements
Minor bug fixes and improvements

• Introducing Zelle(SM). The new easy way to send and receive money between almost any U.S. bank. Now in the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app. Chase QuickPay® is better together with Zelle(SM)
• New credit card view makes it easier to manage your account and monitor your activity

• Introducing Zelle(SM). The new easy way to send and receive money between almost any U.S. bank. Now in the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app. Chase QuickPay® is better together with Zelle(SM)
• New credit card view makes it easier to manage your account and monitor your activity

• Introducing Zelle(SM). The new easy way to send and receive money between almost any U.S. bank. Now in the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app. Chase QuickPay® is better together with Zelle(SM)
• New credit card view makes it easier to manage your account and monitor your activity

• Introducing Zelle(SM). The new easy way to send and receive money between almost any U.S. bank. Now in the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app. Chase QuickPay® is better together with Zelle(SM)
• New credit card view makes it easier to manage your account and monitor your activity
• Redesigned look and user experience for Bill Pay.
Users with an iPhone X can now use Face ID to log on.

• Now you can send a request to multiple friends to split a payment using Chase QuickPay with Zelle.
• Stop payment on a check right from your phone
• Change the due date for your Chase credit card payment.

• Now you can send a request to multiple friends to split a payment using Chase QuickPay® with Zelle®.
• Stop payment on a check right from your phone.
• Change the due date for your Chase credit card payment.

• See your account documents and manage paperless settings.
• New ‘Profile & Settings’ screen makes it easier to access alerts, messages, documents & settings.
• Conveniently set up and manage automatic payments for J.P. Morgan and Chase credit cards.
• Add pay-from accounts from other banks to pay your J.P. Morgan or Chase credit card bill.
• Eligible clients can add their accounts from other banks, and use them to transfer money to and from their J.P. Morgan or Chase accounts.
• Access ‘Ideas & Insights’ for expert opinions, strategic analysis, and actionable ideas to help you reach your financial goals and pursue your passions.
• Send us feedback to help us improve the app.

• See your account documents and manage paperless settings.
• New ‘Profile & Settings’ screen makes it easier to access alerts, messages, documents & settings.
• Conveniently set up and manage automatic payments for J.P. Morgan and Chase credit cards.
• Add pay-from accounts from other banks to pay your J.P. Morgan or Chase credit card bill.
• Eligible clients can add their accounts from other banks, and use them to transfer money to and from their J.P. Morgan or Chase accounts.
• Access ‘Ideas & Insights’ for expert opinions, strategic analysis, and actionable ideas to help you reach your financial goals and pursue your passions.
• Send us feedback to help us improve the app.

• Better design for an improved experience.
• New look and feel presented to Home Lending and Auto customers when viewing their account information.
• Depositing a check? We’ve made it easier through auto capture.

• Use 3D Touch for shortcuts—a long press on the app icon takes you to deposit checks, send, and request & split money options.
• Merge your phone contacts, see when a friend’s enrolled in Zelle®, and use a one-click add for payees with Chase QuickPay®.

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

This update includes:
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

We’ve enhanced the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app Please remember to turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version. Feature updates includes:
• Enjoy a more organized list of all of your profile and settings.
• Access statement summaries from Credit Card transaction activity.
• Freedom cardmembers can now activate their 5% quarterly cash back.
• United cardmembers can now view their rewards balance.

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version.

This update includes:

• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version. This update includes:

iPhone

• Track your progress toward a new account opening bonus.
• We’re giving you the ability to submit approvals for account to account transfers, ACH payments, bill pay, and wires.
• Southwest® cardmembers can now see their rewards balance and card benefits.

iPad

We’ve enhanced J.P. Morgan Mobile® for iPad with a new look and feel. With this update you will see a redesigned experience and many new features including:
• Access to custom groups, assets and liabilities overview, and the ability to group/ungroup accounts by type.
• Access alerts, messages, documents in the new Profile & Settings.
• Enroll in Bill Pay to pay your bills anytime & anywhere.
• Conveniently set up and manage automatic payments for J.P. Morgan and Chase credit cards.
• Add pay-from accounts from other banks to pay your J.P. Morgan or Chase credit card bill.

We’re frequently updating the app in order to give you the best experience. Turn on auto updates to ensure you always have the latest version. This update includes:

iPhone

• Track your progress toward a new account opening bonus.
• We’re giving you the ability to submit approvals for account to account transfers, ACH payments, bill pay, and wires.
• Southwest® cardmembers can now see their rewards balance and card benefits.

iPad

We’ve enhanced J.P. Morgan Mobile® for iPad with a new look and feel. With this update you will see a redesigned experience and many new features including:

• Access to custom groups, assets and liabilities overview, and the ability to group/ungroup accounts by type.
• Access alerts, messages, documents in the new Profile & Settings.
• Enroll in Bill Pay to pay your bills anytime & anywhere.
• Conveniently set up and manage automatic payments for J.P. Morgan and Chase credit cards.
• Add pay-from accounts from other banks to pay your J.P. Morgan or Chase credit card bill.

This update includes:

[+] Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We’ve enhanced the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app.

Now you can:

• See credit card benefits and reward details for select products.
• Check your escrow balance and activity to stay on top of your mortgage.
• Request payoff quotes for mortgages and auto loans.
• Get an auto lease purchase quote.
• Create customized account groups to manage your accounts.

Keep in mind: Features are subject to customer eligibility.

We've enhanced the J.P. Morgan Mobile® app experience with new features that will allow our customers to do more in the app.

Now you can:
• Move account tiles to where you want them.
• Edit spending categories for your credit card transactions.
• Earn statement credits with Chase Offers for credit and debit cards.
• View multiple business accounts on a single dashboard.
• Find investments and check your stock watchlist from the investment dashboard.
• See benefits and rewards details for IHG® credit cards.
• View eligible prior year contributions to your IRA in the investment dashboard.

Keep in mind: Features are subject to customer eligibility.

Now you can:

• Earn statement credits by using Chase Offers with your eligible credit and debit cards.
• Customize shortcuts to some of your account features with Quick Actions
• Easily search your account transactions.
• Review a summary of your spending.
• See how much interest you’ve paid on your auto loan.

Now you can:

• Find research, order status and your watchlist from the investment dashboard.
• Manage Rewards Dollars and see benefits for Disney® Visa® credit cards.
• See benefits information for Hyatt credit cards.
• Review spending summary for business checking accounts.
• Track your credit usage, mortgage progress and monthly spending by category in Snapshot.
• Dispute transactions for business credit cards.

Keep in mind: Features are subject to customer eligibility.
